content: Three years with my Model 3 and I can never go back to gas. Saving over $200/month on fuel, and maintenance costs are practically zero.
author: Tesla Owner

content: The Model Y's space is unbelievable. Fits all our camping gear. Autopilot on the highway is a game-changer for road trips.
author: Tesla Owner

content: I was just going for a test drive. Ended up ordering one the same day. The acceleration is insane â€” it's a completely different driving experience.
author: Tesla Owner

content: Every OTA update feels like Christmas morning. My car keeps getting better over time. No other car manufacturer does this.
author: Tesla Owner

content: Installed a home charger and haven't been to a gas station in 2 years. Plug in at night, wake up to a full battery. It's like charging your phone.
author: Tesla Owner

content: Road-tripped across the country with zero range anxiety. Superchargers are everywhere and crazy fast. 15 minutes for a coffee break and you're good to go.
author: Tesla Owner

content: The silence is what gets you first. No engine noise, no vibrations. Getting into a Tesla feels like entering another dimension. The audio system sounds incredible too.
author: Tesla Owner

content: My wife was against buying an EV. After one drive, it became 'her' car. I only get to drive it on weekends now.
author: Tesla Owner
